text: She threw open the window in her bedroom and for a moment or two later, Trillian staggered, shaking, into the Thunder God's black eyes.

passages.fragment: She threw open the window in her bedroom and for a moment or two
passages.source_name: Long Dark Teatime Of The Soul
passages.full_quote: <used>She threw open the window in her bedroom and for a moment or two</used> leaned out of it at the rather dangerous and awkward angle which allowed her to see a patch of the park

passages.source_name: So Long And Thanks For All The Fish
passages.full_quote: "As it happened, my train was announced <used>a moment or two later, s</used>o I finished my coffee, stood up, picked up the newspaper, and underneath the newspaper..." "Yes?"

passages.fragment: moment or two later , Trillian staggered , shaking , into
passages.full_quote: A <used>moment or two later, Trillian staggered, shaking, into</used> view, supported by her new friend the Thunder God

passages.fragment: , shaking , into the Thunder God 's black eyes
passages.full_quote: The party lurched and swayed, sending everyone reeling, except for Thor and except for Arthur, who stared, <used>shaking, into the Thunder God's black eyes</used>
